.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/mg-toolkit.svg
    :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/mg-toolkit



Install emg-toolkit
===================

    pip install mg-toolkit


Usage
=====

::

    $ mg-toolkit -h
    usage: mg-toolkit [-h] [-V] [-d] -a ACCESSION [ACCESSION ...]
                      {original_metadata}

Example::

    $ mg-toolkit original_metadata -a ERP001736
